title: Henteko na Ai: Nagabe Tanpenshuu
original_name: ながべ短編集 -ヘンテコな愛-
sinopse:
1. Daisy, Mata Ashita. (See You Tomorrow, Daisy)
2. Ookami Ningen to Ningen Ookami. (The Wolf-Man and the Girl-Wolf)
3. Hijoushoku to Gochisou. (Emergency Rations & Bountiful Feasts)
4. Mayonaka no Waltz (Midnight Waltz)
5. Shiro no Ousama. (The White King)
6. Mienai Hitotachi. (Those Without Eyes)
